locations.name: Mountain
locations.description: A tranquil place to set up a camp.

locations.name: Village of Shaepa
locations.description: Local economy is primarily based on agriculture.

locations.name: Village of Jud II
locations.description: Jud is loved by all villagers, young and old. He is a caring leader and welcomes travellers.

locations.name: Town of Poch
locations.description: The best craftment retire to this growing community to study materials of the nearby mountains.

locations.name: Town of The Protectors of His Majestry
locations.description: No bandit dares to pillage around the territory. Afterall this is a territory property of The Royal Guard.

locations.name: City of Aurlesfritch
locations.description: Trading and commerce are in the spirit of this historic city. Products from all the kingdom sell here. Though beware of possible troublemakers.

locations.name: City of Eigno the Great
locations.description: Home of the actual sovereign. Only people of the highest social status wander around.

locations.name: Bandits of the North Stars
locations.description: A group of bandits. Coming from some cult congregated north of here, it seems.

locations.name: Bandits of Crimson
locations.description: Extremely hostile and ruthless bandits. They might be planning on pillaging some nearby city.

locations.name: Chamber in the Peaks
locations.description: The legendary entrance to an eternal treasure reveals itself!
